description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Play as Landon, an Indiemon Tamer, who travels across the Earth Nation protecting it from intruders. Capture and train Indiemon to help you on you journey. All new Earth Island Expansion added for extra gameplay.
description.short: Play as Landon, an Indiemon Tamer, who travels across the Earth Nation protecting it from intruders. Capture and train Indiemon to help you on you journey. All new Earth Island Expansion added for extra gameplay.
